name: Boating Safety Data Collection and Analysis Grant Program
objective: The Boating Safety Data Collection and Analysis Grant is designed to collect data nationwide and produce a National Recreational Boating Safety Survey (NRBSS) and provide consultancy services to measure recreational boating activity utilizing the data collected from this effort.
applicant_types: Nonprofit with 501C3 IRS Status (Other than Institution of Higher Education)
rules_regulations: Office of Management and Budget (OMB) Standards and Guidelines for Statistical Surveys: https://www.whitehouse.gov/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/standards_stat_surveys.pdf
